attributes.name: Azoth Staff
attributes.description: Crackling with preternatural power, an Azoth Staff is the emblem and tool of the anointed Soulwarden.
attributes.parsed_description: Crackling with preternatural power, an Azoth Staff is the emblem and tool of the anointed Soulwarden.

attributes.description: Crackling with preternatural power, an Azoth Staff is the emblem and tool of the anointed Soulwarden.
attributes.parsed_description: Crackling with preternatural power, an Azoth Staff is the emblem and tool of the anointed Soulwarden.

attributes.parsed_description: Crackling with preternatural power, an Azoth Staff is the emblem and tool of the anointed Soulwarden.

attributes.description: Crackling with preternatural power, an Azoth Staff is the emblem and tool of the anointed Soulwarden.
attributes.parsed_description: Crackling with preternatural power, an Azoth Staff is the emblem and tool of the anointed Soulwarden.

attributes.name: Azure Ravager
attributes.description: Blazing a trail of both fire and hope.
attributes.parsed_description: Blazing a trail of both fire and hope.

attributes.name: Bad Intentions
attributes.description: "I fully intend to do you harm."
attributes.parsed_description: "I fully intend to do you harm."

attributes.name: Bad Medicine
attributes.description: "This is going to hurt, but I promise it will help."
attributes.parsed_description: "This is going to hurt, but I promise it will help."

attributes.name: Balanced Blade
attributes.description: "Well balanced for combat."
attributes.parsed_description: "Well balanced for combat."

attributes.name: Balanced Destruction
attributes.description: "Find balance in al lthings."
attributes.parsed_description: "Find balance in al lthings."

attributes.name: Balance of Life
attributes.description: "Life and death are but two sides of the same coin."
attributes.parsed_description: "Life and death are but two sides of the same coin."

attributes.name: Balance of Power
attributes.description: "If the scale tips too far either way, the entire world is in jeopardy."
attributes.parsed_description: "If the scale tips too far either way, the entire world is in jeopardy."

attributes.name: Balance of Time
attributes.description: "Dedication to a craft is only as valuable as your ability to step away from it."
attributes.parsed_description: "Dedication to a craft is only as valuable as your ability to step away from it."

attributes.name: Balanos's Crystal Battleaxe
attributes.description: "The great shaman Balanos was gifted a hatchet when he overtook control of the Lush Hideaway."
attributes.parsed_description: "The great shaman Balanos was gifted a hatchet when he overtook control of the Lush Hideaway."

attributes.name: Bane of Impurity
attributes.description: "Impurities melt away when faced with the harsh light of this staff."
attributes.parsed_description: "Impurities melt away when faced with the harsh light of this staff."

attributes.name: Bannerman's Bane
attributes.description: "Loyalty to the wrong house is such a petty reason to lay down your life."
attributes.parsed_description: "Loyalty to the wrong house is such a petty reason to lay down your life."

attributes.name: Baptism
attributes.description: "Wash away your faults and be reborn."
attributes.parsed_description: "Wash away your faults and be reborn."

attributes.name: Barbed Respite
attributes.description: "When this shield blocks, it bites back."
attributes.parsed_description: "When this shield blocks, it bites back."

attributes.name: Bard's Tale
attributes.description: "Gather around and listen to my story."
attributes.parsed_description: "Gather around and listen to my story."

attributes.name: Baric's Sunstaff
attributes.description: "The light and power of the sun are yours to control."
attributes.parsed_description: "The light and power of the sun are yours to control."

attributes.name: Barnacle Crusted Blade
attributes.description: "Barnacles grow on the hilt of the rapier, the end result of a decade at the bottom of a shipwreck."
attributes.parsed_description: "Barnacles grow on the hilt of the rapier, the end result of a decade at the bottom of a shipwreck."

attributes.name: Baroness
attributes.description: "As his troops were routed, he told me my place was at Court. I put an arrow through his eye."
attributes.parsed_description: "As his troops were routed, he told me my place was at Court. I put an arrow through his eye."

attributes.name: Bastion
attributes.description: "Get behind me! Let them crash against us as waves against the rocks."
attributes.parsed_description: "Get behind me! Let them crash against us as waves against the rocks."

attributes.name: Bastion's Motivator
attributes.description: "The last bastion before the corrupted frontier fought daily for their lives. Seeing the next sunrise was all they hoped for."
attributes.parsed_description: "The last bastion before the corrupted frontier fought daily for their lives. Seeing the next sunrise was all they hoped for."

attributes.name: Battered Wave
attributes.description: "The waves were painted a horrific red after the two ships crashed into battle."
attributes.parsed_description: "The waves were painted a horrific red after the two ships crashed into battle."

attributes.name: Battering Ram
attributes.description: "Each swing breaks the hammer more and more."
attributes.parsed_description: "Each swing breaks the hammer more and more."

attributes.name: Battleaxe of Atlantis
attributes.description: "The coral designs of the axe are beautiful."
attributes.parsed_description: "The coral designs of the axe are beautiful."

attributes.name: Battleaxe of Precise Calculations
attributes.description: "Well callibrated to an engineer's specifications, the razor sharp edge can cut through anything."
attributes.parsed_description: "Well callibrated to an engineer's specifications, the razor sharp edge can cut through anything."

attributes.name: Battleaxe of the Charted Path
attributes.description: "They always knew where we were going and how we would get there."
attributes.parsed_description: "They always knew where we were going and how we would get there."

attributes.name: Battleaxe of the Forgotten One
attributes.description: "She was left to guard the sanctum while her fellow soldiers went scavenging. They never returned, and she still stands there guarding it to this day."
attributes.parsed_description: "She was left to guard the sanctum while her fellow soldiers went scavenging. They never returned, and she still stands there guarding it to this day."

attributes.name: Beam Eternal
attributes.description: Rewarded for completing the quest, 'Reaper's Locus'.
attributes.parsed_description: Rewarded for completing the quest, 'Reaper's Locus'.

attributes.name: Beast of Burden
attributes.description: "It's like an animal, really. If you take care of it, it will take care of you. Do not deny it when it cries for attention."
attributes.parsed_description: "It's like an animal, really. If you take care of it, it will take care of you. Do not deny it when it cries for attention."

attributes.name: Beast's Burly Chopper
attributes.description: "Strong enough to take down a tree in one swing."
attributes.parsed_description: "Strong enough to take down a tree in one swing."

attributes.name: Beast's Demise
attributes.description: "The boar rushed me thinking it would gore me. It had no shot."
attributes.parsed_description: "The boar rushed me thinking it would gore me. It had no shot."

attributes.name: Before We Break
attributes.description: "One more shot can turn the tide."
attributes.parsed_description: "One more shot can turn the tide."

attributes.name: Berserker's Bane
attributes.description: "For all his ferocity, it was his own axe that doomed him."
attributes.parsed_description: "For all his ferocity, it was his own axe that doomed him."

attributes.name: Best Friend
attributes.description: "Patricia always said her best friend would never leave her side."
attributes.parsed_description: "Patricia always said her best friend would never leave her side."

attributes.name: Best Wishes
attributes.description: "Sometimes the things we're looking for show up when we least expect it."
attributes.parsed_description: "Sometimes the things we're looking for show up when we least expect it."

attributes.name: Beyond Reason
attributes.description: "Abominations such as this really prove the point of 'Just because you can, doesn't mean you should.'"
attributes.parsed_description: "Abominations such as this really prove the point of 'Just because you can, doesn't mean you should.'"

attributes.name: Bilelash
attributes.description: "A never ending stream of poison oozes from the head of the hatchet."
attributes.parsed_description: "A never ending stream of poison oozes from the head of the hatchet."

attributes.name: Biting Resonance
attributes.description: "The morning after a heavy snow may seem quiet, but the right sound carries further."
attributes.parsed_description: "The morning after a heavy snow may seem quiet, but the right sound carries further."
